column19: 2015 at the jamestown regional medical center in jamestown. rose geiszler was born august 4
column22: the daughter of john and fredericka (walz) geiszler. she attended school near kulm and in 1946 she moved with her parents to merricourt where she received her elementary education. she and daniel middlestead were married october 12
column24: nd. they made their home on the farm until 1984 when they moved to ellendale. in 1990 they moved into jamestown. following the death of her husband in 1990
column25: she continued to reside in jamestown. she was a member of the st. pauls united methodist church
column26: served as a sunday school teacher
column28: and also the vfw auxiliary. she is survived by her children
column43: sd. she was preceded in death by her parents
column47: 5 brothers and 1 sister. funeral service 10:30 am monday june 15
column48: 2015 at st. pauls united methodist church
